text: Audrey Rose is a 1977 American psychological horror drama movie directed by Robert Wise and based on the 1975 novel of the same name by Frank De Felitta. It stars Anthony Hopkins, Marsha Mason, Norman Lloyd and Susan Swift and was distributed by United Artists. == Other websites == * * * Category:1977 drama movies Category:1977 horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Robert Wise Category:1970s English-language movies Category:American psychological movies Category:1970s psychological movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:American supernatural movies Category:American ghost movies Category:Movies set in Manhattan Category:Movies about reincarnation Category:Movies about children Category:Movies about child death
title: Audrey Rose
